channel.description: Recent content in cocoa Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with cocoa
item.description: Installation or Setup # Cocoa is Apple’s API to develop apps for macOS, formerly known as OS X. Cocoa is a container framework, and contains three sub-frameworks. Foundation AppKit CoreData Cocoa Touch is Apple’s version of Cocoa to develop apps for iOS, watchOS and tvOS. Cocoa Touch contains the same sub-frameworks, except instead of AppKit, it contains UIKit. For Apps without any UI, it is recommended to simply only include Foundation instead of Cocoa
